item.description:
In this month's meetup, we'll go over setting up a WordPress install on your own computer, workshop-style. Bring your computer and we'll go over step-by-step installing a server environment, how to navigate around in your new server, and installing/setting up WordPress (either the stable release version [3.2.1] or the bleeding edge development version). From here you can create themes, test plugins, or just play around with new features not yet released.

If you already have/don't want WordPress set up on your computer, bring other questions you have. Or just come for the snacks.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: September WordPress: WordPress Dev 101
